void Police::checkValidPursuitRange ( float  _dist  ) 

Method to check that the policeman is within the pursuit range around the squad.

Check Pursuit Range - make sure the policeman hasn't got to far from th squad.

Parameters:
[in] _dist,: the distance away from the squad the police can go

Definition at line 183 of file Police.cpp.

References BaseGameEntity::m_pos, m_squadPos, Agent::m_targetID, and m_validPursuit.

00184 {
00185   ngl::Vec3 toSquad = m_pos - m_squadPos;
00186   double distSqFromEachOther = toSquad.lengthSquared();
00187 
00188   // make 2 checks so that the police don't get stuck on the edge of the check
00189   if (m_validPursuit)
00190   {
00191     if(distSqFromEachOther > (_dist * _dist))
00192     {
00193       m_targetID = -1;
00194       m_validPursuit = false;
00195     }
00196   }
00197 
00198   else
00199   {
00200     m_validPursuit = true;
00201     if(distSqFromEachOther > (_dist * _dist )- ((_dist* _dist)/4.0))
00202     {
00203       m_targetID = -1;
00204       m_validPursuit = false;
00205     }
00206   }
00207 }

Find Target ID - finds a valid target to pursue regarding the target's health.
